channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: These 8 Automatic Cat Feeders Were the Best We Tested
item.description: We tested some of the most popular automatic dry- and wet-food pet feeders to see which ones are worth the money.

item.title: Silicon Valley crosswalk buttons hacked to imitate Musk, Zuckerberg’s voices
item.description: The crosswalk buttons, which include audio alerts, were hacked over the weekend.

item.title: Nvidia says it plans to manufacture some AI chips in the US
item.description: Nvidia said on Monday that it has commissioned more than a million square feet of manufacturing space to build and test AI chips in Arizona and Texas ...

item.title: Conifer locks down $20M seed round for its ‘drop-in’ electric hub motor
item.description: A handful of engineers who worked at Lucid Motors and on Apple’s electric car project have launched a new startup that puts a fresh spin on electric h...

item.title: 8 Best Space Heaters (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: These portable heaters will heat a room quickly, quietly, and safely.

item.title: Hugging Face Acquires Pollen Robotics to Unleash Open Source AI Robots
item.description: Hugging Face has acquired the open source robot startup Pollen Robotics to help “democratize” robotics.

item.title: Hugging Face buys a humanoid robotics startup
item.description: AI dev platform Hugging Face has acquired Pollen Robotics, a robotics startup based in France, for an undisclosed amount. Wired reports that Hugging F...

item.title: Helinox Chair One (re) Review: The Best Camping Chair
item.description: Despite the annoying naming convention, the Helinox Chair One (re) is an impressive upgrade to Helinox's classic, compact camping chair.

item.title: Autonomous trucking startup Kodiak Robotics to go public via SPAC
item.description: Self-driving truck startup Kodiak Robotics plans to go public via a merger with special purpose acquisition company Ares Acquisition Corporation II. T...

item.title: How to Build a PC (2025): Hardware Suggestions, Instructions, and More
item.description: Assembling a computer yourself is a good way to learn how they work.
